segments.text: Will you sit down , Mr . White ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . It's very kind of you to invite me to such a beautiful place .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I propose a toast to your pleasant tour in China .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This food is a Wax specialty . Please help yourself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Oh , it tastes nice .
segments.speaker: S2
